schoolDescription: Bazma Information Technology Vocational High School (SMK TI BAZMA) is an excellent boarding school for underprivileged children. The construction of the school, both facilities and operations are funded from the management of waqf and other sources of humanitarian social funds entrusted by the community. SMK TI Bazma organizes learning programs that are taken for 4 years with students who come from various regions throughout Indonesia. SMK TI Bazma organizes education with SIJA (Informatics System, Network & Application) majors with a combination of dormitory-based curriculum.
